ch.nolix.nolixElementLibrary.dialog

Class TabHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.nolixElementLibrary.dialog.TabHeader

  • public class TabHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    A tab header is the item of a tab in the header of a tab container.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabHeader(Named tab)
      Creates new tab header that belongs to the given tab.
